mummy_curses.mythology_structure: Titans, Gods, Monsters, and Kings. The Kings interact with the Gods.
examples: Memnon is a King who fights at Troy and Zeus is so impressed by his Opponent he makes him a God
King Agenor Travels with Zeus, the way the Argonauts Travel with Hercules
Zeus Rapes Agenor's Daughter Europa - where the name of Europe comes from
King Phoenix is his Son - the Greek Phoenix, represents the Entire Society that can burn to Ashes and be Reborn
